channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Girl on a Motorcycle
channel.desc: This sixties cult classic sees a married woman leaving her husband, riding off on her prized motorbike to visit her lover. The late, great Marianne Faithful stars. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Spitfire Voices
channel.desc: The Supermarine Spitfire is one of the most famous fighter aircraft of WW2. Had they not been there, the Battle of Britain could have turned out very differently.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
channel.desc: Bill samples the laid-back red-dirt lifestyle, goes swimming with friendly whale sharks and visits the awesome Pink Lakes. There are also wild emus - and they're hungry.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: NHS - A New Jerusalem
channel.desc: A film charting the early days of the National Health Service, with interviews and stories from the doctors and nurses who were there in the first few decades.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Gosport to create a wildlife-friendly garden with a theatrical twist for drama-loving Nicola and David.

channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Warrington to transform Bindu and Vivek's first garden into a productive, eco-friendly retreat.

channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: Reclaiming unused land for farming is the first role on the 'frontline of freedom'. 1/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team tackle the conditions faced in 1940, in the face of rationing and the Blitz. 2/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team tackle the conditions in late 1940, when British cities were heavily bombed. 3/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team faces a WWII-style government inspection. 4/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Sian explores the truth about healthy options - breakfast products, gluten-free food and fresh fruit. Stefan examines the super-bugs lurking within our salad bags.

channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Across the country, Alice explores what sex means for modern Brits: pleasure, money, something spiritual? Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Battle of Britain
channel.desc: June 1940. Britain stood alone against Nazi Germany. The battle for national survival was fought in the skies over Britain - one of the pivotal moments in history.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
channel.desc: Bill visits Perth and experiences a heady comedic cocktail of hip wineries and prison tunnels, strange gnomes and heavy metal jamming.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Man Down
channel.desc: Stories from men working in the music industry and the toll it has taken on their mental health and wellbeing. Featuring Rag'n'Bone Man, Dev IDLES and Geoff Barrow from Portishead.

channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to create a Thai-inspired garden for Justin and Linda, with a relaxing space for remembrance.

channel.desc: Flo and Lee are in Southampton to transform an awkwardly shaped plot into a Cypriot-styled paradise for Angus.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Suffolk boatyard specialists Mary and Simon's dream is a futuristic aquatic pod. They're experts in their aquatic field, but have they taken on more than they can handle.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Alan and Val put their savings on the line for a high-tech boat to help them spend time with their family. But first they need to learn how to live on the water.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Seasoned floating homeowners Pat and Sue plan to spend their retirement on a state-of-the-art Dutch barge. But will their expensive tastes sink the project.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Surrey, Linda and Mark need an upgrade on their cramped floating home and Linda's doing it by herself. Is passion enough to get the job done.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: What is really in those budget sausages? How are chickens reared and how much of the poultry from supermarkets are contaminated with a deadly bacteria.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: What secrets in the labels for children's food? Stefan puts his health on the line as he eats nothing but supermarket ready meals for a whole month.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hussy
channel.desc: Helen Mirren stars as a sex worker who begins an affair with a shady colleague at their high-class London cabaret. Can their relationship survive? Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
channel.desc: Interviews with 19 men and women who were part of the Battle of Britain - unique accounts of the parts they played in the nation's defence, in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
channel.desc: Bill's bewildered by camel rides, dinosaur tracks and pearl-thieving crabs, as Port Hedland and Broome leave him with some everlasting memories.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Right To Roam
channel.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: D Day - Hour by Hour

channel.title: Sex Secrets
